name: Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Doujinshi Hajimemashita
name_original: Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Doujinshi Hajimemashita
description:
Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Doujinshi Hajimemashita is an action game. It came out on 28-10-2010.
You can play Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Doujinshi Hajimemashita on PSP.
